docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Use Case
docs.text: Dieses Dashboard stellt XYZ dar. Es besteht aus

docs.title: ETL
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Table1] --> |Key: Date| B{Table3};
  C[Table2] --> |Key: ID| B
  B --->|SelfJoin| B
  B --->|Result| E[Table3 in DB#Tableau];

docs.title: Besonderheiten
docs.text:
Um die Daten aus den Tabellen X und Y zu verknüpfen wird über date und id gejoint: 

SELECT t.*
    FROM DB#Test t
    WHERE t.date = '2023-12-31'
    ORDER BY t.date DESC
